headline: Beverage Industry Shifts: What Coca-Cola Must Do to Stay Ahead
summary: KO is reinventing its portfolio with healthier drinks, bold innovations and digital campaigns to fuel growth.

headline: Why Plug Power (PLUG) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of fuel cell technology Plug Power (NASDAQ:PLUG) jumped 8.2% in the morning session after the stock continued its rally from the previous trading session, fueled by a significant analyst price target upgrade and positive operational updates.

headline: PepsiCo Sees Momentum Pre-Q3 Earnings: Is This the Right Time to Buy?
summary: PEP's Q3 outlook shows strength in beverages and global markets, but rising costs may pressure margins despite solid execution.

headline: Reach3 Insights and Coca-Cola Honored in the 2025 ANA Multicultural and Inclusive Marketing Excellence Awards
summary: Reach3 Insights today announced that its work with Coca-Cola has been named a finalist in the 2025 ANA Multicultural and Inclusive Marketing Excellence Awards. The recognition highlights their collaboration on the 30th ESSENCE Festival of Culture presented by Coca-Cola, honoring the campaign as one of the year's best-in-class examples of inclusive marketing.
